===Etymology===
The reading is a [[漢音#Japanese|''kan'on'']]-[[呉音#Japanese|''goon'']] combination, suggesting that this term was probably coined in Japan of {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かもん}}-derived elements as a compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=かもん|家|tr1=ka|t1=house, family, household|紋|tr2=mon|t2=mark, design, pattern}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=on|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR|かもん}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かもん}}

# a [[crest]] for a [[household]] or [[family]]
#: Similar to the [[heraldic]] [[badge]]s and [[coat of arms|coats of arms]] in European [[heraldic]] tradition. Initially held only by [[aristocratic]] families, then gradually adapted by [[commoner]]s.

* {{ja-r|紋所|もんどころ}}
* {{ja-r|定紋|じょうもん}}
